name: Nomzilla: Munching Mayhem
summary:
Don't let the corrupted Humans celebrate their monster hunting festival, Enter their town and start a mayhem!

Created in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 33 with the theme "You are the monster"

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
P - Pause
M - Mute
R - Restart
info:
• 平台: Web
  • 游戏类型: Action
